title: Topic 001 Question 158
body: Your company uses a large number of Google Cloud services centralized in a single project. All teams have specific projects for testing and development. The

DevOps team needs access to all of the production services in order to perform their job. You want to prevent Google Cloud product changes from broadening their permissions in the future. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
options: Grant all members of the DevOps team the role of Project Editor on the organization level.
Grant all members of the DevOps team the role of Project Editor on the production project.
Create a custom role that combines the required permissions. Grant the DevOps team the custom role on the production project.
Create a custom role that combines the required permissions. Grant the DevOps team the custom role on the organization level.
